title: Boeuf Bourguignon in a Thermal Cooker
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '50g butter', '1kg beef, cut into cubes', '3 garlic cloves, crushed', '1 large onion, sliced', '12 rashers of streaky bacon, chopped', '1 large carrot, chopped', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '250g small button mushrooms', '4 tablespoons brandy (optional)', '750ml strong red wine', '300ml beef stock', '2 bay leaves', '1/2 teaspoon fresh ground pepper', '1 thyme, a small bunch']
